name: MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION Code Fairy
name_original: MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION Code Fairy
description: In order to break through the deteriorating war situation in the North American continent, the "Noisy Fairy," a secret unit under the direct control of Kycilia of the Principality of Zeon, led by Alma, is pushing forward in the "One Year War" against the Earth Federation Forces, which possess the White Devil. The soldiers take on the brutality of war and grasp the unshakable bonds between their comrades...
